bwwExcerpt: If you want to have a good time at this show, chances are good that you will; there are many funny sequences, and I laughed a lot. But you may find it rather exhausting. With almost no baseline reality from which to depart, the show is all payoffs and no setups; it's like a stand-up routine consisting only of punch lines Joe Dziemianowicz: NY Daily News: A comedy that comes up short with laughs and overstays its welcome - now that's murder.
